description: Null pointer dereference issue in kernel due to missing check related to LLC support in GPU in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Consumer Electronics Connectivity, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music in QCS605, SDM670, SDM710, SM6150, SM7150, SM8150
